entries.name: String#iseuc   => true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns whether self's encoding is EUC-JP or not.

entries.name: String#isjis   => true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns whether self's encoding is ISO-2022-JP or not.

entries.name: String#issjis   => true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns whether self's encoding is Shift_JIS or not.

entries.name: String#isutf8   => true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns whether self's encoding is UTF-8 or not.

entries.name: String#kconv(to_enc, from_enc)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Convert self to to_enc. to_enc and from_enc are given as constants of Kconv or Encoding objects.
